title: Reels & TikTok
description: Short videos that sell. Increase reach and gain new customers.
content:
Reels That Actually Drive Revenue

Your customer's attention span is under 3 seconds. You either hook them — or they scroll past. With 500+ Reels produced for businesses across Europe, I know exactly what works on Instagram Reels, TikTok, and YouTube Shorts — and what's a waste of your budget.

What You Get

  • Full strategy — Audience analysis, competitor research, trend mapping. Not random filming — a calculated plan
  • Custom scripts — Every video has a clear structure: 1-second hook, value delivery, call to action
  • Professional shooting — Up to 8 videos per shooting day. Cinema quality, efficient process
  • Complete post-production — Editing, captions, sound design, effects, formatted for every platform
  • Music & graphics — Licensed music, branded graphics, lower thirds

Why It Works

Social media algorithms reward retention, dynamics, and engagement. The videos I produce get on average 3x more reach than typical corporate content because they respect platform rules — not your ego. No boring logo intros. No 60-second monologues. Straight to value.

Packages

Starter (3 Reels): Perfect for testing. One shooting block, 3 finished videos, ready to publish.

Growth (8 Reels/month): Complete monthly content. Strategy + shooting + post-production. Most popular choice.

Scale (15+ Reels/month): For brands that mean business. Regular content, A/B testing, data-driven optimization.

Exact pricing depends on scope and requirements. Get in touch — I'll send a quote within 24 hours.

Ideal For

E-commerce brands, personal brands, restaurants, fitness coaches, SaaS companies, real estate agencies — anyone who wants to get customers from social media, not just likes.

Wondering if Reels make sense for your business? Book a free consultation — I'll give you an honest answer.

title: Creative Production

  • Product videos — Professional product presentation, unboxing, demos. E-commerce conversions go up
  • Campaign series — Consistent visual style across entire campaigns. From concept to final delivery

Why Me

I'm not just a 'guy with a camera'. I started as an actor and presenter — I understand working with people on camera. I think like a marketer: every shot has a reason, every cut guides the viewer toward conversion. I've worked with DEKRA, Roklen24, WikyHračky, and dozens of other companies across Europe.

title: Event Video & Conferences
description: Premium coverage for conferences and B2B events. CEO interviews, reports, and full recordings.
content:
Event Video That Works For You All Year

You know how much you invest in organizing a conference — and how much of that disappears the day after? Professional event video turns that investment into an asset that sells for 12 months. It builds prestige, attracts sponsors, and drives registrations for next year.

What I Capture

  • Main stage — Keynotes, panel discussions, ceremonies. Multi-camera recording with professional audio
  • CEO interviews — Short, engaging interviews with speakers and VIP guests. Perfect for LinkedIn
  • Event atmosphere — Behind the scenes, networking, details. Content that shows the energy of your event
  • Same-day highlights — Key moments edited and delivered the same day. For social media directly from the venue
  • Attendee testimonials — Quick soundbites from guests that serve as social proof

Why B2B Companies Choose Me

In corporate environments, discretion and professionalism are everything. I move discreetly among guests, never disturb speakers, and the output looks like a professional documentary — not an amateur vlog. I've filmed events for OICT, DEKRA, Tatra Trucks, and numerous conferences.

Through my partnership with SocialVids, we handle large international events with multi-person crews — 3+ cameras, livestream, drone, sound engineer.

title: Live Stream & Webinars
description: Reliable streaming for conferences and webinars. Anywhere in London, Prague or Europe.
content:
Professional Livestreaming. Zero Compromises.

Hybrid events aren't the future — they're the present. Half your audience is watching from their office, from a train, from the other side of the world. The question isn't whether to stream, but whether you'll do it professionally or amateurishly.

What I Provide

  • Multi-camera live switching — Real-time switching between speaker, presentation, and audience. Not a static corner shot
  • Professional audio — Wireless microphones, real-time mixing. Online viewers hear as clearly as those in the room
  • Presentation integration — Slides, videos, and graphics directly in the stream. Picture-in-picture, fullscreen switching
  • Backup internet — Own backup connectivity. If the venue WiFi drops, your stream keeps running
  • 4K recording — The entire stream is simultaneously recorded. You have footage for later use

Where We Stream

Public platforms: YouTube Live, LinkedIn Live, Facebook Live — for maximum reach and audience interaction.

Secure platforms: Zoom, Teams, Vimeo — for internal events, AGMs, training with restricted access.

Perfect For

Press conferences, AGMs, annual meetings, corporate training, conferences with hybrid audiences, panel discussion webinars, product launches with global audiences.

Indicative Pricing

Simple stream (1 camera): from €500 — Ideal for lectures and webinars

Professional stream (2-3 cameras): from €1,000 — Multi-cam switching, graphics, backup line

Premium stream (full day): from €1,800 — Complete coverage, technical crew, recording

Price includes setup, equipment, and operator. Send your specs — we'll respond within 24 hours.

title: Post-production
description: Already have footage? We'll turn it into a professional video.
content:
You Have The Footage. You Need The Result.

A full drive of raw footage from a shoot, conference, or company event — now what? Without professional post-production, they're just files. With the right editing, sound, and color, they become a video that builds your brand.

What I'll Do With Your Material

  • Professional editing — Pacing, rhythm, narrative arc. No boring minutes, every shot earns its place
  • Color grading — Cinematic look, consistent colors, atmosphere. The difference between 'filmed' and 'professional'
  • Sound design — Clean audio, music, sound effects. Half the video experience is sound
  • Graphics & captions — Lower thirds, infographics, animated text, branded graphics
  • Content repurposing — From a 30-minute interview, I'll cut 10-15 short clips for social media

Typical Projects

Corporate footage → polished video: Filmed a meeting, training, or event on your own camera? Hand it to me — get back a professional output.

Drone footage → cinematic reel: Beautiful aerial shots that look like security cam footage? Editing and grading will transform them.

YouTube / Podcast editing: Regular post-production for YouTubers and podcasters. Including thumbnails and captioning.

Social media repurposing: One long interview = dozens of clips for Instagram, TikTok, LinkedIn. Maximum content yield.

Indicative Pricing

Basic edit (up to 5 min): from €200 — Edit, music, export

Advanced post-production: from €500 — Color grading, graphics, sound design

Repurposing package: from €350 — 10 short clips from one source

Ongoing collaboration: Custom pricing — Monthly packages for YouTubers and podcasts

Typical delivery 3-7 business days. 48h express available. Send your material — you'll receive a quote within 24 hours.

title: Bilingual Event Moderator & Conference Host
description: Professional MC and moderator for international conferences, panel discussions, and corporate events. Bilingual English/Czech. Experienced with tech, corporate, and startup events.
content:

A great event needs more than great speakers — it needs someone who connects the dots. As a bilingual event moderator with a filmmaker background, I bring a unique combination: professional stage presence, camera comfort, and the ability to switch seamlessly between English and Czech.

What I Bring to Your Event

  • Professional Presence — Camera-comfortable (filmmaker background), confident on stage, appropriate for corporate/B2B settings
  • Bilingual Excellence — Fluent English and Czech with seamless language switching. No awkward pauses or confusion
  • Preparation Obsessed — I study all speakers and topics in advance, prepare engaging questions, know the audience, and adapt on the fly
  • Energy & Timing — Keep energy high throughout, manage time strictly, smooth transitions, handle unexpected situations calmly

Services I Offer

  • Conference Moderator — Full-day or multi-day conferences. Introduce speakers, manage Q&A, keep schedule on track
  • Panel Discussion Host — Research topics and panelists, prepare thought-provoking questions, facilitate engaging discussion
  • Product Launch MC — Energetic product unveiling, demo presentations, audience engagement
  • Awards Ceremony Host — Professional ceremony hosting, award presentations, entertaining between segments
  • Webinar & Virtual Event Host — Online conference moderation, manage virtual audience questions, engaging on camera

Why a Filmmaker Makes the Best Moderator

My background as a filmmaker is my secret weapon. I understand cameras and production, know how to position myself for great footage, and I create "moment-worthy" content naturally. Your event video will look better because your moderator knows what looks good on camera.

Pricing

Half-Day Event (4 hours): €800 — Pre-event consultation, full preparation, 4 hours on-site, post-event debrief

Full-Day Event (8 hours): €1,400 — Pre-event consultation, full preparation, 8 hours on-site, post-event debrief

Multi-Day Conference: €1,200/day — 2+ days at discounted rate, consistent energy throughout

Virtual Event: €600 (half-day) / €1,000 (full-day) — Zoom, Teams, StreamYard experience

Booking Process

  1. Initial Call (30 min, free) — Discuss event details, confirm availability, align on style and tone
  2. Event Brief — Send event schedule, speaker bios, topics, audience info
